title: Text Alignment in the "status-item" tab of the Website needs to be word wrapped
description: If we go to http://lucene.apache.org/core/ or http://lucene.apache.org/solr/ under the Latest Dev section the text is exceeding the css boundary. This is happening on both Firefox and Chrome.

comments.content: Adding style=”word-wrap: break-word” to the status-item div solves the issue. Although I will add this properly to the global.css file upload a patch by today.
comments.author: Varun Thacker

comments.content:
I just added the word-wrap: break-word to the "sidebar" div style. 

I uploaded the snapshot to show what the problem was. Mine is a 15.6" screen(1366 X 768 pixels) and on a smaller screen with resolution (1280 X 800) this problem was not there though.
comments.author: Varun Thacker

comments.content: Thanks Varun! Hand't seen this issue - I'll take a look at making this change (though we have trimmed some from the sidebar recently).
comments.author: Mark Miller

comments.content:
Hi Mark,

I just saw LUCENE-3819. All the problems stated here have been addressed there. So closing this issue.
comments.author: Varun Thacker
